channel.title: CVE Feed for node.js -- adm-zip
channel.description: The latest CVEs for node.js -- adm-zip

item.title: CVE-2018-1002204|2024-08-05T12:47:57.468Z -- node.js -- adm-zip
item.description: adm-zip npm library before 0.4.9 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowing attackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in a Zip archive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability is also known as 'Zip-Slip'.
